pages.heading: Example Single Array
pages.text: This is an example using a single array.  This template is the normal template.$(br2)The double array template uses the same template, just with an "a" recipe on top and a "b" recipe below.

pages.a.heading: Example Double Array A
pages.b.heading: Example Double Array B
pages.b.text: text under the B array.  There's nothing stopping you from putting text under the A array, but it would overlap.
